content.raw: I think the part of PluginLoader that tries different shared library extensions could be moved to SystemPaths. Then the argument to `PluginLoader::LoadLibrary()` would be the path to a library rather than the name of the library to search for.

content.raw: Ok, this is happening because I was trying to build this as its own cmake project... Nevermind me ;)
content.html: Ok, this is happening because I was trying to build this as its own cmake project... Nevermind me ;)

content.raw: I noticed it isn't possible to build this plugin by itself. I don't think it's necessary for this PR, but we could keep in mind to add an example of a plugin which is its own cmake project later, as a reference for users. For example, Gazebo has an [examples/plugins](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/4e250e782cf04f70d2db6ad885a59bf6186691af/examples/plugins/?at=default) directory where each plugin can be built individually.
content.html: I noticed it isn't possible to build this plugin by itself. I don't think it's necessary for this PR, but we could keep in mind to add an example of a plugin which is its own cmake project later, as a reference for users. For example, Gazebo has an examples/plugins directory where each plugin can be built individually.

content.raw:
I see the [SystemPaths](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/b3d0e504a4a7f85621119e33bdc1b81cb5f97ee4/include/ignition/common/SystemPaths.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) class was not used here and instead there is custom logic added to handle paths. Was that on purpose? Is there value in integrating that here?

As a reference, here's [gazebo::common::SystemPaths](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/4e250e782cf04f70d2db6ad885a59bf6186691af/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default). Note how it has methods specific to plugins.
